Jones bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nke a maara nke ọma màkà ihe osise ya. Ọ bi na Mount Rainier, Maryland, mpaghara Washington, D.C.
Jones bụ ónyé gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1980 na Mahadum Maryland
Jones bụ ónyé mmeri onyinye 2017 site na Prince Georges County Arts and Humanities Council.
N'afọ 2016, The Baltimore Sun dere na "Wayson R

Jones' "Black President" (2012), ihe osise na-enweghị atụ na ákwà na-etinye graphite ntụ, acrylic medium na gesso nké yiri ka ọ na-emetụta esemokwu, n'ime na n'èzí. Ọzọkwa na 2016, na nyocha nke otu ihe ngosi, The Washington Post gosipụtara eziokwu ahụ bụ na "Otu n'ime onyinye kachasị njọ na nké kachasị dị ịrịba ama bụ Wayson R
Jonesz na-adịghị ahụkebe nkè a sụgharịrị na black-and-white
